title: Pixel 2 change
content:
Hello!
I have had a problem since september, but now its more and more of a problem.
I have a Pixel 2 with Android 9 that have a charging problem.

It charges only when I bend the cable in a specific way
But when I try to charge it in my car with a other charger its the same problem.

It has a problem to charge. 

I havn´t dropped the phone or something like that.

I have tryed to charge it, on, safe mode and off but it´s the same problem.
I have tryed to blow air into it and I have tryed to se if there were something blocking the charging port on the device, but no luck yet.

Need some help from you!

Greetings from 
Peter Röjel
Sweden

Virusfritt. www.avast.com
 Safe & Secure
 
Google Help Center
